channel.title: Need a hoster!
channel.description: Hi I was just looking for a hoster for my server. You see I just have a laptop and Its really confusing to run a server off a laptop. If you can and wud be intrested In helping please PM me your MSN or AIM screen name or Email Thanx [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] www.Moparscape.org/smf for all private server related stuff. 1 week posting ban so you can read for a week instead of opening your mouth before thinking.[/center]

item.title: Need a hoster!
item.dc:creator: @jaron3734 jaron3734
item.description:

Hi I was just looking for a hoster for my server.
